name: Air Fighter in Galaxy Attack 3
description:
Air Fighter in Galaxy Attack 3 is the best aircraft shooting game. You’re last hopeful of Earth against alien and different dangerous animal, your mission is control Fighter and join the battle to save Earth from the space attacker.
Features
Charming sound and music with amazing graphics
Precision controls.
Air fighter upgrade your fighter you increase your coins and buy new fighter
Get coins and increase your score
Background sound is very amazing
Best space shooting game
